Body:
collection = lookup.TemplateLookup()
collection.put_string('functions.html',
    """
            <%def name="foo()">
                this is foo
            </%def>

            <%def name="bar()">
                this is bar.
                ${caller.body()}
                ${caller.lala()}
            </%def>
        """
    )
collection.put_string('index.html',
    """
            <%namespace name="func" file="functions.html" import="*"/>
            <%call expr="bar()">
                this is index embedded
                foo is ${foo()}
                <%def name="lala()">
                     this is lala ${foo()}
                </%def>
            </%call>
        """
    )
assert result_lines(collection.get_template('index.html').render()) == [
    'this is bar.', 'this is index embedded', 'foo is', 'this is foo',
    'this is lala', 'this is foo']
